MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 17-DEC-2020 12:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the CH63 postcode area of Raby, affecting properties in Raby Mere Road, Willowbrow Road, The Crossway and surrounding area. Restoration is taking longer than expected because of repairs required to broken equipment on the overhead network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12 noon. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:43am on 17th December 2020.
